app.name: Alera
app.description: Your personal health companion for medication reminders and habit tracking

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.enableNotifications: Enable notifications to never miss reminders

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By downloading, accessing, and using the Alera application, users confirm that they have read, understood, and agreed to all applicable terms and conditions. If the user does not agree with these terms, it is recommended not to continue using the application.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content: Alera is a health reminder application designed to help users manage medication schedules, build healthy habits, and monitor health progress through reminders, quick actions, and analytics visualizations. This application serves as a support tool and does not replace professional medical services.

section3.title: 3. User Responsibility
section3.content: Users are fully responsible for the accuracy and completeness of the data entered into the application, including medication schedules, health habits, and other related information. Any decisions made based on the applicationâ€™s information are the sole responsibility of the user.

section4.title: 4. Reminders and Notifications
section4.content: Alera provides reminder and notification features to help users maintain consistency in their health activities. The effectiveness of notifications may be affected by device settings, operating systems, application permissions, and internet connectivity.

section5.title: 5. Privacy and User Data
section5.content: Alera respects and protects user privacy. User data is used solely to support application functionality and improve user experience, and will not be shared with third parties without user consent, except as required by law.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: Alera is not responsible for any direct or indirect losses, health risks, or other impacts arising from the use of the application, including user negligence in responding to provided reminders.

section7.title: 7. Changes to Terms
section7.content: The Alera development team reserves the right to modify, update, or adjust these terms and conditions at any time. Changes take effect once displayed within the application, and continued use of Alera constitutes acceptance of those changes.
